tweets.text:
Deer hunters on horseback have been filmed using whips as they chased an exhausted #stag across #Exmoor before it was killed.

Investigators from the League took photos and video showing two hunters using a whip to force the stag to continue running.

https://t.co/nRLRDpljND

urls.title: Sign up for flood warnings
urls.description: Register your home or business in England, Scotland or Wales to receive flood warnings and find out how to check flood risk in Northern Ireland

tweets.text:
Making sure our watercourses are clear is one of our first line defences against flooding. 

#Teamea are out in #Lancashire and #Merseyside today making sure our rivers are free from debris. 

Are you prepared? Sign up to free flood alerts and warnings https://t.co/H8Syy3Xnp8 https://t.co/t7kVCbfq6a

#TeamEA have been cleaning grids at Preesall Pumping Station today to make sure our rivers are clear of debris washed down by the heavy rain. 

We regularly monitor our regions rivers and work around the clock to keep them clear. https://t.co/fDVI7Tu1jO

The Flood storage Basin in #Croston, #Lancashire has been operated today to take pressure off the nearby River Yarrow following the recent heavy rainfall. 

You can check the latest river levels near where you live online üëâhttps://t.co/spz1PwxKAq https://t.co/5brfE3TgA5

tweets.text:
Yes yes yes a new CENTA blog post! 

@Shtacy_Phillips, one of the winners of @2020Centa, explained her research through Lego stop motion animation. For her placement at the @EnvAgency she has done something similar but with a focus on e-DNA #mustread #MustWatch #LEGO https://t.co/PI7ehcqcKb

New coastal emergency 999 stickers have been launched along the Redcar & Cleveland coastline in partnership with @EnvAgency @CoastguardNE @RedcarCleveland      - the safety slogan inc. ‚ÄòNo #selfie is worth your life‚Äô. For the full story https://t.co/V4B0DthDHs #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/Uk8lOyvW4e

We‚Äôve had reports of fish turning up in English north west rivers and as such the @EnvAgency and @ATFreshwater have issued our guidance and reporting system to anglers south of the border https://t.co/3NU3RPMhAm

tweets.text:
With wet weather comes surface water issues and urban runoff polluting our waterways where lack of precaution has been taken

This shows how important projects such as 'Only Rain Down The Drain' are in highlighting where issues may lie and helping partners to reduce their impact https://t.co/pHWaPBuqw1

After today's heavy rain @EnvAgency has issued a flood alert for the Lower River Irwell. They're  expecting the river to peak about 5pm  and not to issue a flood warning  but please stay alert and keep an eye on the situation. https://t.co/pgB5TBHbTm
  https://t.co/5rAbbIq3kC https://t.co/O044ktOrC7

tweets.text:
Fantastic to see the efforts of local residents, @pinder_chauhan, @NorthantsPolice, @NorthamptonBC, @andrealeadsom & various agencies work to get this resolved

The travellers have now left but cleaning up the site will be a major task. I'll be continuing to with NBC & @EnvAgency https://t.co/QMobQBgC0Q

Somerset, are you prepared for winter? Join us and our partners between Tuesday 20th- Thursday 22nd October for a free virtual event with training, videos and presentations- everyone is welcome! @somersetprepare https://t.co/PVwiwYfgxj

Great news - culture, heritage and nature are critical to the North's recovery and the well-being of its people.  And the north has all three in spades!!  üé≠üé®üéºüèòÔ∏èüåÑüèõÔ∏èüè∞üå≥üêøÔ∏èüå≤ @HistoricEngland @ace_thenorth @HeritageFundNOR @EnvAgency https://t.co/yEaz7pjwD8
"As rivers in¬†Wales¬†deteriorate & fill with pollution, a coalition of groups has called for a moratorium on planning approval for new intensive poultry units in Powys."  https://t.co/gulhkEV0St
@MariaHerlihyEA @EnvAgencySE @MarkHill03 @TobyWillisonEA @wifo_ea @sarahchareEA Interesting to read. I'll give it a mention on @BBCSurrey - did you clear away anything particular?

This is another one of the free online training sessions we have planned for the @somersetprepare event 20-22 October - Crisis Recovery, about how we move through crisis to a new normal, and navigate the steps in between @CommunitiesPrep @EnvAgencySW 
https://t.co/aAloHJBEho

This does not bode well. The @EnvAgency chief @JamesBevanEA says the agency "lacks the powers and resources" to tackle farm pollution. Might've been worth mentioning this a little sooner? 
https://t.co/ufu58O0RI0

We have been out to Barns Pool, #Rushall, West Midlands, to investigate reports of fish deaths. We are now working with partners to aerate the water to increase O2 levels. If you see an environmental incident, please ring us on 0800 807060.

‚ö†Ô∏è For the latest flood warnings in #Lancashire see: https://t.co/RT4dHyOuv8 and follow @EnvAgencyNW and @TheFloodHub for updates.

Our Partners @EnvAgencyYNE protecting a further 30,000 homes and businesses across the #Humber.
What amazing work building #resilience for the future. https://t.co/25nfnsX7do

Out in #Hull seeing terrific progress on our major flood schemes along the #Humber and River Hull. Once complete next yr, will better protect a huge 30k homes & businesses. And a vital piece of jigsaw to underpin #climate resilience & future growth of this great city https://t.co/LR6XypUwt5

As a little contrast everyday water companies leak 2,954,000,000 litres of water from their underinvested, under repaired, faulty, leaky pipes.

Yep that's 1,078,210,000,000 litres of water per year stolen from our rivers.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/RkJP0KAsoX

There are currently 2 Flood Warnings and 4 Flood Alerts in place for parts of the North West including #Lancashire and #Merseyside. 

Visit https://t.co/uGQ4g6A5Xn for more information. 

Make sure you're signed up to receive free #flood warnings so you can #beprepared.

Making sure our watercourses are clear is one of our first line defences against flooding. 

#Teamea are out in #Lancashire and #Merseyside today making sure our rivers are free from debris. 

Are you prepared? Sign up to free flood alerts and warnings https://t.co/H8Syy3Xnp8 https://t.co/t7kVCbfq6a

Power cuts: Call 105 to report a power cut or get updates when your electricity has been cut off.

@EnvAgency ‚Äî call the floodline, 0345 988 1188, to report a flood or if your property is at risk of flooding from a reservoir, river or coastal water.
